oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Breakable objects : building blocks for flexible application architectures
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JAMWAL, V
IYER, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper proposes the concept of Breakable Objects (BoBs) as the building blocks for flexible application architectures. We claim that BoB Driven Architecture (BODA) greatly facilitates automated refactoring of an application for various deployment scenarios.

oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 5th Working IEEE/IFIP Conference on Software Architecture (WISCA 2005),Pittsburgh, PA,NOV 06-10, 2005
